## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                                             | Type                                                           | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`    | Icon name (Font Awesome icon name without 'fa-' prefix) | `string`                                                       | `undefined` |
| `size`              | `size`    | Icon size                                               | `"2xl" \| "base" \| "lg" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs" \| undefined` | `undefined` |
